name: Jayesh Shelar
title: Senior AI/ML Engineer
summary: Innovative and results-driven Senior AI/ML Engineer & Data Scientist with 12+ years of experience architecting, deploying, and optimizing intelligent data systems across healthcare, finance, and enterprise domains. Expert in building machine-learning models, scalable MLOps pipelines, and cloud-native analytics using Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and modern data-engineering stacks. Proven ability to translate complex data into actionable insights and production-grade models that drive automation, prediction accuracy, and business ROI.

experience.title: Senior AI/ML Engineer
details: Architected and implemented AI pipelines for healthcare analytics, integrating multimodal data exceeding 25 TB.
Designed deep-learning architectures for radiology image classification, boosting accuracy to 91%.
Developed clinical NLP systems using BERT and spaCy, improving retrieval efficiency by 40%.
Built automated MLOps pipelines with Kubeflow and MLflow, reducing deployment cycles from 3 weeks to 3 days.
Applied SHAP & LIME for explainability dashboards, ensuring compliance with HIPAA/GDPR.
Containerized inference services via FastAPI + Docker deployed on AWS SageMaker with sub-250 ms latency.
Led collaboration with data engineers and clinicians for feature governance and reproducibility.
Mentored a 6-member team in deep learning best practices and automated evaluation.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer / Data Scientist
details: Developed real-time anomaly detection using PySpark Streaming + Kafka processing 2M events/minute.
Implemented predictive models for churn forecasting with AUC > 0.93.
Built BERT-based pipelines for automated response generation, reducing resolution time by 35%.
Automated preprocessing with Airflow DAGs and Snowflake.
Orchestrated retraining via CI/CD with Jenkins and Docker.
Created Streamlit dashboards for explainability and transparency.
Standardized Terraform scripts for multi-environment model rollouts.

experience.title: Data Scientist / AI Engineer
details: Designed recommendation engines improving engagement for SaaS clients.
Implemented NLP pipelines for text analysis and classification, reducing manual workload by 60%.
Built Flask microservices handling sub-200 ms inference latency.
Migrated workloads to AWS, reducing cost by 28%.
Created visualization dashboards using Plotly and Power BI.
Researched transfer learning achieving 40% cost reduction for inference.

experience.title: Data Analyst & Software Developer
details: Delivered analytics and automation for manufacturing and retail businesses.
Built predictive maintenance models reducing downtime by 15%.
Developed ETL pipelines consolidating multi-source data into PostgreSQL.
Created dashboards in Tableau and Power BI for optimization.
Built scraping utilities using BeautifulSoup + AWS Lambda.
Developed Flask-based analytics web apps and mentored analysts.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
